mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, NP_TITLE, NP_NO ,TO_CHAR(NP_PSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NP_PSDATE FROM ( SELECT NP_TITLE, NP_NO , NP_PSDATE FROM NONPROGRAM WHERE NP_DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY NP_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT ROWNUM, NB_NO, RPAD(TRIM(SUBSTR(NB_TITLE, 1, 7)), 17, '.') AS NB_TITLE ,TO_CHAR(NB_INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NB_INSERTDATE FROM ( SELECT NB_NO, NB_TITLE, NB_INSERTDATE FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NB_DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY NB_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
